name: Keep My Notes Backup
summary: A MYNOTESBACKUP file contains a backup of notes created by Keep My Notes, a notepad and memo app for Android devices. It stores a backup of one or more notes, which include text, font color and size, and the theme style. MYNOTESBACKUP files are useful for saving a backup of important notes and transferring notes between devices.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
